item.title: Calculus Cheat Sheet
item.description:
Gradient

A vector field in the direction of steepest ascent.

$$ \nabla f( x_{1}, x_{2}, \dots x_{i}) = \begin{bmatrix} \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{1}} \\ \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{2}} \\
\vdots \\
\frac{\partial f}{\partial x_{i}} \end{bmatrix} $$
